DYAD: USA-INDONESIA

Territorial-Maritime-Boundary Issues Variables

MID4460 

TERRMID: MID4460 3 -- not territory 
TERRMID-CER: MID4460 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: 

TERRLINK: MID4460 3 -- not third party link to territory 
TERRLINK-CER: MID4460 1 -- certain 
TERRLINK-NOTES: 

MARITMID: MID4460 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID4460 1 -- certain 
MARITMID-NOTES: MID4460 from cm narrative, on 7/3/2003, US warships and planes briefly violated Indonesian waters near the island of Java. Tensions did not escalate. Coded not maritime because the US and Indonesia were not disputing a maritime boundary.

ISLMID: MID4460 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID4460 1 -- certain 
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID4460 3 -- not civil war 
CIVWARMID-CER: MID4460 1 -- certain 
CIVWARMID-NOTES:

CIVWARLINK: MID4460 3 -- not civil war link 
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID4460 1 -- certain 
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID4460 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID4460 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID4460 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID4460 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 


MID4 2002-2010:

MID4460
rivalry=2850 nationa=USA nationb=INDONESIA MID4460 20030703-20030703 
 revtype1a=NOT APPLICABLE revtype2a=NOT APPLICABLE fatala=NONE fatalpa=0 lhosta=DISPLAY OF FORCE 
 revtype1b=NOT APPLICABLE revtype2b=NOT APPLICABLE fatalb=NONE fatalpb=0
lhostb=NO MILITARIZED ACTION 

On July 3, USA warships and planes briefly violated Indonesian waters near the island of Java. First day of dispute was on 7/3/2003 and last day of dispute was on 7/3/2003.
